text: You're up and you feel fantastic.  No sickness is going to keep you down today!
Awareness comes fast, your body coming quickly to attention after your rest.
Your body stretches with ease, and you feel ready to take on the world.
You struggle to awareness.  Being awake seems somewhat harder to reach today.
You're up, but your body seems like it would rather stay in bed.
You feel like you've got fisted all night.  You consider why you're doing this to yourself.
You're too weak to be hungry anymore.  Is this what starving to death feels like?
Even though you've eaten not too long ago you still feel drained of energy.  It will take more than that to get you back up.
Your empty stomach gnaws at you.  You really need something to eat.
You feel weak due to malnutrition.
Despite having something in your stomach, you still feel like you only ate DINGUSES in the last daysâ€¦
You've lost quite a bit of weight recently.  You might want to eat less DINGUS food.
You feel that you need to eat more calorie-dense food.
